result.value: Rails API application for managing DataCite providers, clients, prefixes and DOIs. The API is based on the JSONAPI specification.
doi, graphql, jsonapi, lupo, rails-api, ruby

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Bump events queue group concurrency by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1424


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.49.0...5.50.0

## What's Changed
* Fix for repository type and repository delete summary in OpenAPI docs by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1415
* Add geoLocationPolygon to openapi.yaml by @KellyStathis in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1417
* Make polygonPoint and inPolygonPoint mutually exclusive in OpenAPI reference by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1418
* ROR API Version 2 changes by @ashwinisukale in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1398
* Plug the new event services other doi job logic into the existing lupo OtherDoiJob by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1420


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.48.5...5.49.0

## What's Changed
* Skip client domains and Schema version validation when importing metadata from XML by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1413
* Adds documentation for repository create, update, and delete by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1414
* FIX: Add Sentry logging to doi deletion rake task  by @kaysiz in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1416


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.48.4...5.48.5

## What's Changed
* build(deps): Bump rack from 2.2.19 to 2.2.20 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1408
* Implement support for all GeoLocation sub-properties, including geoLocationPolygon by @svogt0511 in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1382
* Change elasticsearch mapping of creators.affiliation.name and contrib… by @svogt0511 in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1412


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.48.3...5.48.4

## What's Changed
* build(deps): Bump rack from 2.2.18 to 2.2.19 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1402
* Add missing resource-type-id options to openapi.yaml by @KellyStathis in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1404
* Allow passenger to be configured with Environment Variables by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1410


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.48.2...5.48.3

## What's Changed
* refactor: Migrate from sentry-raven to sentry-ruby and sentry-rails by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1405
* Fix: Reintroduce Sentry exception handling in ApplicationController by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1406


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.48.1...5.48.2

## What's Changed
* Fix: Sync indices during reindex with `index_sync_enabled?` by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1395
* Increase passenger worker concurrency by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1401
* Refactor Indexable and improve test isolation by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1403


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.48.0...5.48.1

## What's Changed
* build(deps): Bump rexml from 3.3.9 to 3.4.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1394
* Remove validation when hiding DOIs by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1399
* Add rake task to delete dois for a client by @kaysiz in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1397
* Update to bolognese 2.3.7 by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1400
* build(deps): Bump rack from 2.2.14 to 2.2.18 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1396


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.47.0...5.48.0

## What's Changed
* build(deps): Bump thor from 1.3.1 to 1.4.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1372
* build(deps): Bump nokogiri from 1.18.8 to 1.18.9 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1373
* Add normalizer to opensearch mapper to help implement case insensitiv… by @svogt0511 in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1347
* Add datacite batch enqueue group to shoryuken config by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1393


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.46.1...5.47.0

## What's Changed
* Update bolognese by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1392


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.46.0...5.46.1

## What's Changed
* Add log statements to debug nifs 2025 event ingestion issue by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1378
* Add new support task queue by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1380
* Add rake/job for metadata migration by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1381
* Clarify detail=true by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1386
* Set ES Refresh Interval for DataciteDoi and OtherDoi indices by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1379
* Batch enqueue Datacite DOI import tasks by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1388
* Add destroy hook for metadata object store by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1389
* Use parallel each for metadata migration by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1391


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.45.0...5.46.0

## What's Changed
* Add parallel processing for nifs events by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1376


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.44.0...5.45.0

## What's Changed
* Fix flaky test: Clean DB before run by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1368
* Specifies v1 of ROR API by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1369
* Move metadata file storage for metadata history to S3 by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1339
* Increase DB and Memcached Pool Sizes by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1370


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.43.0...5.44.0

## What's Changed
* Fix send import message error by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1367


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.42.1...5.43.0

## What's Changed
* Skip Doi model validations when transferring to different client by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1364


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.42.0...5.42.1

## What's Changed
* Optimize OtherDoi bulk import by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1358
* Add nifs event post ingestion environment variable flag by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1363


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.41.0...5.42.0

## What's Changed
* Remove invalid `:events` association by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1356
* Speed up model specs by disabling Elasticsearch and prefix pool size by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1355
* Bump uri from 0.13.0 to 0.13.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1335
* Bump rdoc from 6.6.2 to 6.6.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1168
* Fix `next` link params for clients by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1360
* Move default ENV settings for tests to test env by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1361
* Refactor AWS config to support s3 specific endpoints by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1362
* Create NIFS event processing task by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1359


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.40.0...5.41.0

## What's Changed
* Bump rack from 2.2.6.4 to 2.2.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1330
* build(deps): Bump nokogiri from 1.16.2 to 1.18.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1351
* Bump rexml from 3.2.5 to 3.3.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1312
* build(deps): Bump net-imap from 0.4.10 to 0.4.20 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1350
* build(deps): Bump webrick from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1352
* Bump rails-html-sanitizer from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1311
* Update to latest bolognese. by @svogt0511 in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1353


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.39.0...5.40.0

## What's Changed
* Remove AWS from tests by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1346
* Removes "delete" verb from reports endpoint documentation by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1294
* Set default test environment variables by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1349


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.38.4...5.39.0

## What's Changed

* Fix for XML not updating when blank or nil values are sent via JSON using REST API by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1307

* Implements repositoryTypes facet and repositoryTypeId filter in GQL by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1292
* Query builder (1 of 3): Additional specs  by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1302
* Refactors `/dois` faceting and adds support for on-demand facets by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1299

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.33.1...5.34.0

* Fix contributor affiliation list in openapi.yaml by @KellyStathis in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1268
* Chang default DOI search order by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1272

## What's Changed

* Update passenger by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1258

## What's Changed
* Clean up openapi.yaml by @KellyStathis in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1236
* Ci fail early by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1239
* dry up code in app/models/doi.rb by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1242
* Faster tests 1 - ability_spec.rb by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1244
* Rework ability_spec.rb so it doesn't spill over into other specs by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1245
* upgrade google-protobuf due to potential denial of service issue by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1247
* Add new UAT environment by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1252
* Refactor large spec (spec/requests/datacite_dois_spec.rb) by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1251
* Increase from 10 to 16 parallel ci runners by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1254
* Make sure we clear the index before we reindex by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1255


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.28.4...5.29.0

## What's Changed
* Update elasticsearch-rails lib to 7.2.1 by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1204
* Use SQS_PREFIX not ES_PREFIX for queues by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1205

## What's Changed
* Add missing sort parameter options for GET /dois by @KellyStathis in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1098

* remove debug log statements by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1197
* Rspec test and performance fix for as indexed json method by @ashwinisukale in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1200
* Description for PUT requests in OpenAPI by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1201
* Change ES_HOST lookup for config swiching to just match on datacite.org by @richardhallett in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1203

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/5.21.0...5.22

## What's Changed
* fix hash_connection#end_cursor nilclass error by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1172
* fix hash_connection#has_next_page nilclass error by @wendelfabianchinsamy in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/1174

* Add relatedItems to the openapi file for the docs by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/894
* Doi enrichment - Add subjects to repositories/clients by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/877
* Adjusts validation of Doi language attribute to allow non-ISO 639-1 values by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/893
* Create CITATION.cff by @mfenner in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/767
* Fix ES index definition to match the JSON data structure by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/909

result.name: Rails 6
result.description:
This PR releases the Rails 6 version of Lupo to Test/Production :tada: 

## What's Changed
* Fix gzipped request test by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/837
* Rails6 duplicate errors by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/839
* Fix provider tests broken due to casing by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/840
* Update openapi.yaml to improve reference API by @KellyStathis in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/842
* Rails 6 by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/844
* Minor updates to openapi.yaml by @KellyStathis in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/846

## New Contributors
* @KellyStathis made their first contribution in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/842

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/4.6.2...5.0.0

## What's Changed
* Changed deleted account email preheader text to reflect the intent of… by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/825
* Fix Wrong relationtypes by @kjgarza in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/824
* Pagination fix by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/833
* Addresses error where some author aggs with multiple nameIdentifiers result in array index error by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/832
* Add fields to pagination by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/835


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/4.6.1...4.6.2

## What's Changed
* Updating client trigger reference_repository update.  Respects uniqueness of re3dois by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/826
* Update dependencies by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/827
* Downcase re3data_id in ReferenceRepository.update_from_client by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/830


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/4.6.0...4.6.1

## What's Changed
* GraphQL returns nil for creators/contributors properties with hash for affiliation  by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/809
* ReferenceRepository graphql by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/803
* Gql fixes by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/811
* Skip double-encoding diacritics by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/812
* Gql fixes by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/813
* Repository uid: use only lowercase letters and numbers by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/814
* Only load clients into reference repositories if they have not been d… by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/815
* Upgrade dependencies by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/816
* More dependency upgrades by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/817
* Repository cursor by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/819
* Sort on non-formatted date field by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/820
* Fix Repository facets by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/823

## New Contributors
* @codycooperross made their first contribution in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/809

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/4.5.12...4.6.0

## What's Changed
* Use non-depricated way to specify the path for bundle installs by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/804
* Update gh action for pull_requests to configure memcached servers usi… by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/808
* Cites/IsCitedBy fix by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/810


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/4.5.11...4.5.12

- Test for isCitedBy issue (#799)
- Cleanup for DOI indexing (#800)
Deploy [PR #796](https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/798) - ES - DOIs Deposited in the Wrong Index (fix).
Merge PR #796 - ES - DOIs Deposited in the Wrong Index.
Allow doi_estimate to be set for any organization type.
Add doi estimate field to allocators.
Fix 2 issues: jwt and testing in release.yml.
Fix for jwt issue.
Fix for datacite/bracco#541 - contacts issue, consortium organizations.

result.name: Related Items hotfix
result.description: This release fixes the current related_items bugs by temporarily removing it from the DOI Serializer

## What's Changed
* Updates to bring Lupo up to full support for Metadata Schema v4.4 by @digitaldogsbody in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/771
* Issue #1431 - Update lupo scripts for managing prefixes/dois. by @svogt0511 in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/775
* Repository search graphql endpoint updates by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/778


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/4.4.49...4.5.0

## What's Changed
* Remove v3 rspec tests from pull_request action by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/769
* Add certificate filter to potential arguements for repository list in… by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/768
* Fix a few string array fields on the data_catalog graphql endpoint by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/lupo/pull/770


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/lupo/compare/4.4.48...4.4.49

result.name: Updating export csvs
result.description: Rename headings to better align

result.name: Bug fix for single creators
result.description: Single creators should always appear as an array in the JSON API.

result.name: Fix schema conversions
result.description: This release is to fix the conversion from schema including attributes on subjects that were incorrectly getting converted causing an invalid metadata result when trying to update attributes via the API.

result.name: Deploy visibility of linkcheck results
result.description: * The API will now expose on DOI queries the extra link check results.

result.name: Fixes for Get DOI on test servers
result.description: Fixes DOI get_url to retrieve from correct handle server relative to deployment.

result.value:
Using Docker.

```bash
docker run -p 8065:80 datacite/lupo
```

or

```bash
docker-compose up
```

If you want to build the docker image locally (instead of pulling it from docker hub)
 and use docker compose for development you can use
```bash
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml
```

You can now point your browser to `http://localhost:8065` and use the application. Some API endpoints require authentication.
